name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Quality Assurance Engineer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I specialize in ensuring high-quality software delivery across diverse platforms such as iOS and Android. Proficient in **C#**, **Java**, and **Unity**, I leverage tools like **AWS Device Farm**, **Kobiton**, and **Unreal Engine Blueprints** to execute effective testing strategies. My expertise also encompasses **CI/CD**, utilizing **Jenkins** and **Azure DevOps** for streamlined testing workflows. With strong skills in debugging and effective communication, I efficiently collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance product quality and performance. My background includes a focus on automation and thorough testing methodologies that ensure robust software solutions.
